messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: [A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a sales company. Amir is the CEO of the company and has two senior managers under him: Wim and Raj. Wim has two salespersons reporting to him: Jing and Wei. Raj has two salespersons reporting to him: Nisha and Reza. Jing is donating 56 books and Wei is donating 22 books. Nisha is donating 10 books and Reza is donating 50 books. Assume you can pick one path to collect books.  From Amir, who should you meet with to get the maximum number of books? Please list the names in order, including Amir, separated by commas

The path to get the most books is to meet with Wim. 
Wim: 56 books, Wei: 22 books, Jing: 56 books, Raj: 0 books, Nisha: 10 books, Reza: 50 books
Amir: 0 books
Wim has 56 books and Wei has 22 books for a total of 78 books. 
Nisha has 10 books and Reza has 50 books for a total of 60 books. 
Amir has 0 books and Wim has 0 books for a total of 0 books.
Thus, Wim has the most books at 78.

This time youâ€™re meeting with Amir and he tells you about his secretary, Kim. Kim has a portal and through this portal itâ€™s possible to go to to meet with any of Wimâ€™s direct reports. When you meet with Amir and choose the path that led to the maximum number of books previously, you discover that the path is now blocked.  You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the maximum number of books. Starting from Amir, who should you meet with to get the maximum number of books? Please list the names in order, including Amir, separated by commas.

Starting from Amir, you should meet with Wim to get the maximum number of books.

Amir: 0 books
Wim: 56 books, Wei: 22 books, Jing: 56 books, Raj: 0 books, Nisha: 10 books, Reza: 50 books
Wim: 56 books

Amir is the CEO of the company, Wim is one of his two senior managers, and Wim has two salespersons reporting to him: Jing and Wei. Wim has 56 books, and he has a portal through which it's possible to go to meet with any of Wim's direct reports. 

Jing has 56 books, and she is donating those books to Wim. Wei has 22 books, and she is donating those books to Wim. Nisha has 10 books, and she is donating those books to Wim. Reza has 50 books, and he is donating those books to Wim. 

Wim has a total of 78 books, including the books donated to him by Jing, Wei, Nisha, and Reza.

Therefore, the best path to get the maximum number of books is to meet with Wim.
